ActivityDefinitionCategory

High-level categorization of the type of activity in a protocol.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/activity-definition-category defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
diet DietTo consume food of a specified nature
drug DrugTo consume/receive a drug, vaccine or other product
encounter EncounterTo meet or communicate with the patient (in-patient, out-patient, phone call, etc.)
observation ObservationTo capture information about a patient (vitals, labs, diagnostic images, etc.)
procedure ProcedureTo modify the patient in some way (surgery, physiotherapy, education, counseling, etc.)
supply SupplyTo provide something to the patient (medication, medical supply, etc.)
other OtherSome other form of action
